original_title: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow: A Shadow Puppet Film
overview: What really happened to Ichabod Crane? The ancient art of shadow puppetry meets the classic American ghost story in this enchanting, family-friendly adaptation of “The Legend of Sleepy Hollow,” created by puppeteer and children’s author/illustrator David Hyde Costello.
title: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow: A Shadow Puppet Film
